summary: During a slave revolt in 1844, a British mercenary aids an Antilles island-colony gain its independence from Portugal but years later he returns there to manhunt a local rebel army leader and former friend.
cast: Marlon Brando|Evaristo Márquez|Renato Salvatori|Dana Ghia|Valeria Ferran Wanani|Giampiero Albertini|Carlo Palmucci|Norman Hill|Thomas Lyons|Turam Quibo|Álvaro Medrano|Alejandro Obregón|Enrico Cesaretti|Cicely Browne|Herbert Jefferson Jr.|Maurice Rodriguez
title: Queimada
